channel.title: Cannot Compile
channel.description:
I'm running windows xp SP3 and i can't compile any ideas
Things Ive Already tried Uninstalling JDK and java Resetting the paths on the compiler getting a new compiler
If you need any more info just post and ill update

item.title: Cannot Compile

item.description:
@sir_bloodhound wrote:

what is the error what comes up when you click compile? might be able to help

item.title: Cannot Compile
item.dc:creator: @ipwnu2day ipwnu2day
item.description:
@ipwnu2day wrote:

Server Compiler:

@echo off @TITLE Server Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit

Client Compiler:

@echo off @TITLE Client Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit

This might not be the right compiler. You have to be more detailed…

Read full topic
